apps.name: World of Creators
apps.localizedDescription: Since birth I have had the ability to see and describe energy fields. I call this ability reading and scanning. This makes it easy for me to see people, places, animals and objects energetically and as a result to recognize where blockages are and where certain energies are flowing. I recognize what the person or place or even an animal needs in order to be in harmony and attunement with itself.

versions.localizedDescription: Since birth I have had the ability to see and describe energy fields. I call this ability reading and scanning. This makes it easy for me to see people, places, animals and objects energetically and as a result to recognize where blockages are and where certain energies are flowing. I recognize what the person or place or even an animal needs in order to be in harmony and attunement with itself.

privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: World of Creaters may use your microphone to send audio messages to a joined group chat.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: World of Creaters may use your photo library to pick profile photo.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: World of Creaters may use your location to show you other members nearby.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: World of Creaters may use your photo library to pick profile photo.
